title: Classic Movie Sidekicks
description: Every hero needs a loyal companion! How well do you remember the unforgettable sidekicks from classic films?

questions.question: In 'The Wizard of Oz' (1939), which three companions join Dorothy on her journey to the Emerald City?
Who played the loyal Sam, Rick's piano player, in 'Casablanca' (1942)?
In 'Star Wars' (1977), what is the name of Han Solo's towering Wookiee co-pilot?
Walter Brennan won three Best Supporting Actor Oscars. In which 1959 western did he play Stumpy alongside John Wayne?
In the 'Thin Man' series, what type of animal is Asta, the scene-stealing pet?
Who played Tonto alongside Clayton Moore's Lone Ranger in the 1956 film 'The Lone Ranger'?
In 'Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid' (1969), who played the Sundance Kid to Paul Newman's Butch?
In Disney's 'Pinocchio' (1940), what is the name of Pinocchio's cricket companion and conscience?
Which actor played Sancho Panza to Peter O'Toole's Don Quixote in 'Man of La Mancha' (1972)?
In 'The Adventures of Robin Hood' (1938), who played Robin's loyal friend Little John?
R2-D2 and C-3PO are the beloved droid duo from 'Star Wars.' Who played C-3PO?
In 'The African Queen' (1951), Katharine Hepburn's character is a sidekick to which actor's riverboat captain?
In 'Jaws' (1975), which grizzled fisherman becomes Brody's ally in hunting the shark?
In 'Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom' (1984), what is the name of Indy's young sidekick?
Who played Igor (pronounced 'Eye-gor') in Mel Brooks' 'Young Frankenstein' (1974)?
